Name: wealthy-gorilla-7368
Text: Just tried to cook dinner and somehow managed to set off the smoke alarm instead. Guess I’m a culinary genius in my own smoky way. Someone send help (and maybe takeout).

Comments.Name: rainbow-robin-6898
Comments.Text: Is setting off the smoke alarm a sign of daring experimentation or just a warning against reckless cooking?

Comments.Name: hospitable-woodlouse
Comments.Text: Maybe next time, try a simpler recipe—unless you enjoy auditioning for a fire drill.
